title: I'm A Celebrity first look: Ant and Dec stranded in swashbuckling interactive promo
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest I'm a Celebrity stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Ant McPartlin and Declan Donnelly are finally back together for I'm A Celebrity in a swashbuckling promo set legions away from the jungle.

A brand new teaser, set to air on Saturday, shows the much-loved presenters sailing in a boat to Australia.

However the pair quickly get in trouble as as their map is blown away and sent hurtling out to see.

Ant and Dec are in a bit of a dilemma and viewers will have to head to the official I'm A Celeb app to vote for what happens next.

Fans can choose for the double act to either face 'Tropical Tides' or 'Artic Antics' in the second promo, which will air in a few weeks' time.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

In total, Ant and Dec have filmed seven different promos and fans vote for which one they want to see on screen.

This is the first time that Ant and Dec have been back on TV together for I'm A Celeb since 2017.

Last year, Dec was joined by Holly Willoughby after Ant pulled out of presenting jobs to focus on his health.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Never miss I'm a Celeb news Keep up with all the latest news from the jungle with our I'm a Celebrity newsletter. We'll send updates directly to your inbox so you never have to miss a thing from Dec, Holly and the campmates. Sign up using this form by typing in your e-mail address, selecting I'm a Celeb and pressing submit.

In April 2018, Ant pleaded guilty to drink-driving after being involved in a road collision the previous month.

He was subsequently banned from driving for 20 months and fined a record-breaking £86,000.

(Image: James Gourley/ITV/REX/Shutterstock)

In August that year he confirmed that he would be taking a break from presenting until 2019 and said: "My recovery is going very well and for that to continue having spoken to Dec and ITV, I have made the decision to take the rest of the year off."

He returned to presenting in January 2019 to host Britain's Got Talent, after I'm A Celebrity aired.

*I'm A Celebrity airs returns November on ITV
description: Ant and Dec are finally back together for I'm A Celeb, but they're in a bit of a tricky situation...
